definitions.text: found in the ordinary course of events; ; ; - Anita Diamant
examples: there's nothing quite like a real...train conductor to add color to a quotidian commute

definitions.text: concerned with the world or worldly matters
examples: he developed an immense terrestrial practicality

definitions.text: belonging to this earth or world; not ideal or heavenly
examples: not a fairy palace; yet a mundane wonder of unimagined kind
so terrene a being as himself
